All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPartInController
    _____________________________________________________________________
    ADD NEW PART CLASS
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class controls the Add New Part screen and controls the following:
    Reads data from form fields to save to new Part Object
    Saves new Part Object to Inventory allParts list
    Generates and sets unique partID for new Part
    AddProductController
    _____________________________________________________________________
    ADD PART CONTROLLER Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class is responsible for the follow:
    Creating new Product Object
    Saving new Product Object to Inventory allProduct list
    Populating Inventory list allParts to Available Parts Table
    Adding selected parts from Available parts table to associatedParts list for Product Object
    Removing parts from associatedParts list for Product Object
    Searching available parts table and displaying results matching search parameters
    InHouse
    _____________________________________________________________________
    InHouse Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This is a subclass of the Part class
    This class contains constructors for the class and getter and setters
    for class specific variables
    Inventory
    _____________________________________________________________________
    Inventory Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class creates inventory ObservableList objects for parts and Products
    This class includes methods to facilitate the following:
    * Add new Parts and Products to the Inventory ObservableLists
    * Search through Inventory ObservableLists to find a Part or Product
    * Update variables within Parts and Products to the Inventory ObservableLists
    * Delete Parts or Products from Inventory ObservableLists
    * Return full lists of Part or Product Inventory ObservableLists
    * Generate unique Part and Product IDs
    Main
    _____________________________________________________________________
    Main Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    The Main class launches the Inventory Systems Management Application
    The application will allow users to do the following:
    View current inventory of parts and products
    Add/modify Parts to the inventory system
    Add/modify Products to the inventory system
    Search through list of current Parts and Products
    Delete selected parts and products
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    MainMenuController
    _____________________________________________________________________
    MAIN MENU CONTROLLER Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class is responsible for the follow:
    Launches the Add/Modify Part GUI
    Launches the Add/Modify Product GUI
    Deletes Pats/Products from inventory
    Closes the program
    ModifyPartInController
    _____________________________________________________________________ MODIFY PART CLASS --------------------------------------------------------------------- This class controls the Modify Part screen and controls the following: Populates form field data with corresponding data from selected Part Object Reads data from form fields to save to existing Part Object Updates existing Part Object in Inventory allParts list
    ModifyProductController
    _____________________________________________________________________
    MODIFY PRODUCT CONTROLLER Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class is responsible for the follow:
    Updating existing Product Objects in the Inventory allProduct list
    Populating Inventory list allParts to Available Parts Table
    Adding selected parts from Available parts table to associatedParts list for Product Object
    Removing parts from associatedParts list for Product Object
    Searching available parts table and displaying results matching search parameters
    Outsourced
    _____________________________________________________________________
    Outsourced Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    Outsourced Class is a subclass of the Part class
    This class constructs OutSourced Part objects
    This class contains getters and setters for class specific variables
    Part  
    Product
    _____________________________________________________________________ Product Class ---------------------------------------------------------------------
